span.title: Article Title: VIDEO MESSAGE FROM DR. SKAGGS
Article Title: CANCELLED - NEW STUDENT REGISTRATION DAY - APRIL 22

h3.span: CANCELLED - NEW STUDENT REGISTRATION DAY - APRIL 22

span.span: The New Student Registration Day scheduled for Wednesday, April 22nd has been cancelled. We will reschedule at a later time. Thank you for your understanding.

span.title: Article Title: ELEMENTARY MUSIC AT HOME

span.div: Mr. Trio made this video montage of Elementary students making music at home. Thank you to the students and parents who submitted videos. We hope you enjoy it!

span.title: Article Title: FREE & REDUCED LUNCH INFORMATION

div.class: kvgmc6g5 cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q
div.style: animation-duration: 0s; color: #050505; font-family: inherit; font-size: 14.86px; font-weight: 400; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: left; transition-duration: 0s; white-space: pre-wrap
animation-duration: 0s; font-family: inherit; text-align: left; transition-duration: 0s

div.div: Families with students on Free & Reduced Lunch:

div.class: o9v6fnle cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q
div.style: animation-duration: 0s; color: #050505; font-family: inherit; font-size: 14.86px; font-weight: 400; margin-top: 0.5em; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: left; transition-duration: 0s; white-space: pre-wrap
animation-duration: 0s; font-family: inherit; text-align: left; transition-duration: 0s

div.div: You will receive a phone call today with instructions on how to sign up to receive breakfast and lunch for your student(s) during our extended closure.

div.class: o9v6fnle cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q
div.style: animation-duration: 0s; color: #050505; font-family: inherit; font-size: 14.86px; font-weight: 400; margin-top: 0.5em; overflow-wrap: break-word; text-align: left; transition-duration: 0s; white-space: pre-wrap
animation-duration: 0s; font-family: inherit; text-align: left; transition-duration: 0s

div.div: If your student(s) participates in Free & Reduced Lunch and you would like to be placed on the pick-up list, please call 740.699.2256.

span.title: Article Title: Board of Education Meeting

div.span: The St. Clairsville-Richland City School District Board of Education has rescheduled the time of the May board meeting. The May meeting has been scheduled for May 13, 2020 at 5:30 p.m. The meeting will be held via Zoom and access directions are available on the District’s website under the Board of Education tab.
